The ITestRunner type exposes the following members.

Properties
Show:
 NameDescription
ExitBehavior

Represents property ExitBehavior.

UseCommandLineOptions

Represents property UseCommandLineOptions.

UseRTTI

When true, test fixtures will be found by using RTTI to search for classes decorated as TestFixtures.  Note for this to work you may need to use {$STRONGLINKTYPES ON} otherwise the classes may not get linked as they are not referenced. When False you will need to register the fixtures using TDUnitX.RegisterTestFixture
